climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: HERO Sensor - Next-generation HERO sensor delivers incredible performance and up to 10x the power efficiency over previous generations. HERO is an optical sensor capable of exceptional accuracy and responsiveness with 400 IPS precision and up to 12,000 DPI sensitivity.

LIGHTSPEED Wireless - Ultra-fast LIGHTSPEED Wireless technology gives you a lag-free gaming experience. G305 delivers incredible responsiveness and reliability with a super fast 1 ms report rate for competition-level performance.

Ultra-Long Battery Life - Play at peak performance without worrying about running out of power. G305 boasts an incredible 250 hours of continuous gameplay at 1ms report rate in Performance mode on just one AA battery. G305 has a battery indicator light that flashes red at 15% battery remaining. Switch to Endurance mode via Logitech Gaming Software and extend battery life up to 9 months on a single AA battery. Endurance mode reports at 8 ms.

Lightweight - G305 is designed to be lightweight for high maneuverability. Wireless does not have to mean heavy. G305 is a lightweight gaming mouse that comes in at only 99 grams thanks to efficient lightweight mechanical design and ultra-efficient battery usage.

Portable Convenience - The durable, compact design with built-in nano receiver storage makes G305 not just a great desktop mouse, but also a great laptop travel companion. Use it with a gaming desktop or throw it into a bag with a gaming laptop to play anywhere.
body.description: G305 features the next-gen HERO sensor with 12,000 DPI sensitivity and LIGHTSPEED wireless 1 ms performance. It’s long-lasting with 250 gaming hours from one AA battery (an indicator light reminds you before you need a new AA), ultra-portable with built-in nano receiver storage, lightweight weighing in at 99 grams, and ready to game with 6 programmable buttons. G305 is the LIGHTSPEED wireless mouse for all.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: G305 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse Express yourself with a variety of colors to match your playful spirit and personal style. The G305 is packed with fun and great performance.

Lightweight Design Wireless does not have to mean heavy. G305 is a lightweight mechanical gaming mouse that weighs in at only 99 grams for amazing maneuverability. Goes Wherever You Game The compact and durable design with built-in nano receiver storage makes G305 not just a great desktop mouse, but a great laptop travel companion. Ultra-Long Battery Life Play at peak performance without worrying about running out of power. G305 delivers up to an incredible 250 hours of continuous gameplay. Crisp Reliable Button Metal spring button tensioning

Advanced HERO Sensor Next-generation HERO optical sensor delivers exceptional performance, accuracy and responsiveness with up to 12,000 DPI sensitivity and 10X the power efficiency over previous generations.
6 Programmable Buttons G305 sports two primary buttons plus middle click, DPI button and two side buttons. Program them all with custom gaming actions using Logitech G HUB software.

G335 Wired Gaming Headset All-day comfort, vibrant colors, and gaming-grade audio—meet the G335. LEARN MORE G915 TKL LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Keyboard A new class of wireless mechanical gaming keyboard in a compact tenkeyless design. LEARN MORE G733 LIGHTSPEED Wireless RGB Gaming Headset Lightweight and comfortable wireless headset delivering an immersive audio experience thanks to advanced Pro-G drivers. LEARN MORE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Gem in White - Logitech G305 Lightspeed
reviews.reviewText: I recently got my hands on the Logitech G305 Lightspeed in its striking white variant, and I must say it's an absolute gem. This mouse deserves every bit of its 5-star rating for several compelling reasons, though it's not without a few minor quibbles.Pros:1. Speedy Wireless Connectivity: The Logitech G305's wireless performance is impressive, offering responsiveness that rivals wired mice. It's perfect for fast-paced gaming, and I haven't experienced any noticeable lag. However, its wireless range could be improved, so be mindful of that.2. Sharp and Tactile Clicks: The mouse clicks are a standout feature for me. They're sharp, tactile, and provide a satisfying feedback that's crucial for precision in gaming. It's a pleasure to use for both gaming and everyday tasks.3. Comfortable Ergonomics: The G305's ergonomic design suits a claw grip style, which I personally prefer. It fits comfortably in hand, allowing for long gaming sessions without discomfort.4. Lightning-Fast Sensor: The sensor speed on this mouse is fantastic. It's incredibly accurate and responsive, ensuring your every movement is translated flawlessly on-screen. This is a significant advantage for gamers who demand precision.5. Good Battery Life: While it's not the best among wireless mice with swappable batteries, the G305's battery life is still respectable. It keeps you gaming for hours before needing a battery change.Cons:1. Non-Rechargeable: One notable drawback is that the G305 relies on swappable batteries instead of being rechargeable. While this allows for uninterrupted gaming by swapping batteries, it can be a hassle to source and replace them.2. Limited Software Customization: The Logitech G-Hub software, while functional, leaves something to be desired in terms of customization options. I wish it offered more advanced features to truly unlock the mouse's potential.3. Easily Pressed Side Buttons: The side buttons, while of good quality, are somewhat prone to accidental presses due to their placement. This may be a minor inconvenience for some users.4. Prone to Dirt: The white variant of the G305 is a stunner, but it does attract dirt and smudges relatively easily. Regular cleaning is needed to keep it looking pristine.Overall, at a price point of $35, the Logitech G305 Lightspeed in white is an exceptional buy. Its swift wireless connectivity, tactile clicks, comfortable design for claw grip users, and blazing sensor speed make it a top-notch gaming mouse. While rechargeability and more comprehensive software features would be nice additions, they don't detract significantly from the overall value. If you're looking for a budget-friendly yet high-performance gaming mouse, the G305 is an excellent choice that won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Smart Assistant for a Connected Home
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased an Alexa device and I must say, it has completely transformed the way I interact with my smart home. The convenience and functionality it offers are truly impressive.First and foremost, the voice recognition technology is outstanding. Alexa understands my commands flawlessly, even in noisy environments. Whether I'm asking for the weather forecast, setting timers, or playing my favorite music, Alexa responds promptly and accurately.The range of skills and capabilities that Alexa possesses is remarkable. From controlling my smart lights and thermostat to ordering groceries and checking my calendar, Alexa seamlessly integrates with various smart devices and services. The ability to create routines and automate tasks has made my daily life so much easier.Another aspect that I appreciate is the continuous improvement and updates from the Alexa team. They regularly introduce new features and skills, ensuring that my Alexa device stays up-to-date and relevant.The sound quality of the device is also worth mentioning. Whether I'm listening to music or engaging in a phone call, the audio is clear and crisp, providing an immersive experience.Lastly, the setup process was straightforward, and the user interface is intuitive. Even for someone who is not tech-savvy, getting started with Alexa was a breeze.Overall, I highly recommend this Alexa device to anyone looking to enhance their smart home experience. Its reliability, versatility, and user-friendly interface make it an excellent addition to any household.tell me a good revew of a Logitech G305 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse, Hero 12K Sensor, 12,000 DPI, Lightweight, 6 ProgramTitle: Exceptional Performance and Comfort for Gaming EnthusiastsReview: I recently purchased the Logitech G305 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This mouse is a game-changer for any avid gamer seeking top-notch performance and comfort.First and foremost, the Hero 12K Sensor is a true standout feature. With a maximum DPI of 12,000, this mouse offers exceptional precision and accuracy, allowing for smooth and responsive movements. Whether I'm sniping in FPS games or executing precise maneuvers in strategy games, the G305 delivers consistent and reliable tracking.The lightweight design of the mouse is another aspect that I truly appreciate. Weighing in at just the right balance, it feels incredibly comfortable in my hand, even during long gaming sessions. The ergonomic shape provides a natural grip, reducing fatigue and ensuring optimal control.The six programmable buttons are a fantastic addition, allowing me to customize my gaming experience to suit my playstyle. With the Logitech Gaming Software, I can easily assign macros and commands to these buttons, giving me a competitive edge in intense gaming situations.One of the standout features of the G305 is its wireless connectivity. The LIGHTSPEED technology ensures a lag-free and ultra-fast connection, providing a seamless gaming experience. The battery life is impressive as well, lasting for months on a single AA battery, making it incredibly convenient for long gaming sessions without interruptions.The build quality of the mouse is exceptional, as expected from Logitech. The buttons have a satisfying click, and the scroll wheel feels precise and durable. The overall construction feels solid and well-built, ensuring longevity even with intense gaming usage.In conclusion, the Logitech G305 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse is a remarkable choice for gamers seeking top-tier performance, comfort, and customization options. Its exceptional sensor, lightweight design, programmable buttons, and reliable wireless connectivity make it a must-have for any gaming setup. I highly recommend this mouse to fellow gaming enthusiasts looking to elevate their gaming experience to new heights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My aim in Valorant has improved tremendously because of this mouse
reviews.reviewText: I game a lot, specifically Valorant where aim is incredibly important. I used to have this $9 mouse that I gamed with and I thought for the longest time that my aim was just because I was bad at the game. But once I realized that maybe it wasn't and got this mouse, my gaming life changed. This mouse is so good, the reactivity and responsiveness of it is super nice. There are other gaming mice out there for like $100 but get this one because it's half the price and just as good. You can change the DPI right on the mouse on the top button and there are 4 options. It runs so smoothly it's so beautiful every time I get headtaps in my game. The battery life of it is also really good. I've had the same battery in it for like 3 months and it works just fine. It goes to sleep and then when you shake it, it comes to life. The material itself is nice, it's smooth and the grip is good. There's also buttons on the left side you can use. I'm so glad I got this mouse because now I don't have to curse myself for being trash at games when I'm actually not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the first wireless mouse that I purchased to use for gaming. This mouse feels good in my hands and is very light weight. Mine unfortunately broke. It no longer connects to the bluetooth. I'm not even sure if it turns on anymore. I've changed the battery, no luck.I have used several other wireless mice, this one is probably my favorite that I used so far. It works great for wrist aiming and it feels just as responsive as a wired mouse. I cannot go back to wired mice after using this. The battery life is very good, this mouse is not wasting juice on useless lights or other cosmetic features. Its a great cheap wireless mouse that you can use for gaming. There may be better options out now but this will still work fine.
Entrega rápida e qualidade de material, padrão Logitech. Ótimo custo benefício.

El peso del mouse es casi al doble cuando instalas la batería, tengo baterías recargables de 3000MhA y dura una ETERNIDAD. buen producto especialmente si tienes manos pequeñas, Logitech rara vez falla - YaTeHabiaDicho | TTV

I recently upgraded my gaming setup with the Logitech G305 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. This mouse has been a game-changer in every sense of the word.Performance: ★★★★★The Hero 12K sensor with 12,000 DPI on the Logitech G305 is a gaming enthusiast's dream come true. It provides impeccable precision and responsiveness, which is crucial in intense gaming situations. Whether you're into first-person shooters or real-time strategy games, this mouse delivers exceptional performance. The LIGHTSPEED wireless technology ensures minimal lag, making it feel as responsive as a wired mouse.Design: ★★★★★The G305's design is simple and elegant. It's lightweight, which is a significant advantage for extended gaming sessions. The ambidextrous shape fits comfortably in both left and right hands, and the textured grip ensures a secure hold. The six programmable buttons are conveniently placed and have a satisfying click to them.Wireless Technology: ★★★★★I was initially skeptical about using a wireless mouse for gaming, fearing latency issues. However, the LIGHTSPEED wireless technology on the G305 completely eliminates those concerns. It's fast, reliable, and I've never experienced any noticeable delay during gaming. Plus, the battery life is outstanding, so I don't have to worry about frequent recharging.Value for Money: ★★★★★The Logitech G305 offers incredible value for its price. You're getting high-end gaming performance without breaking the bank. It's an excellent choice for both casual and competitive gamers who want top-notch performance without the premium price tag.Conclusion:In summary, the Logitech G305 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse is a brilliant addition to any gamer's arsenal. It excels in performance, design, and wireless technology, all at an affordable price point. If you're looking for a responsive, precise, and comfortable gaming mouse, the G305 is an excellent choice that won't disappoint. Whether you're sniping enemies or commanding armies, this mouse will take your gaming experience to the next level. I highly recommend it to gamers of all levels.

reviews.reviewTitle: Vale cada centavo; mouse pequeño y con excelente sensor aunque sin materiales premium
reviews.reviewText: Se lo compré a mi novia porque ella no tenía un mouse con buena precisión para juegos o edición digital. Estamos muy contentos con el producto, especialmente con su desempeño aún siendo inalámbrico. El tamaño es pequeño y por ello se ajusta más a manos pequeñas y medianas. Los materiales se sienten de buena calidad pero no premium, aunque por el costo me parece excelente valor precio/calidad.Lo recomiendo si quieren un mouse de marca confiable, a buen precio, con excelente sensor y si lo quieren inalámbrico. No estoy seguro si trae la función de "emparejar" el mouse con un nuevo receptor Logitech, así que cuídenlo bastante.¡Recomendado!
Product looks good and works well. USB mouse that runs on battery. :)) love it
